entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compiler produces a *lot* of UncommonData instance values possibly unnecessarily. #67717
  • If option are sended to LSP client, its name and group name need to be frozen #67714
  • RangeVariableSymbol allows for 'null' location. #67713
  • C# Extract Method refactoring does not adhere to editorconfig settings for line endings #67711

Closed

  • IDE0045 gives a false positive #67649
  • Testing mermaid #67715

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: not for review yet. #67727
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • LSP Completion Handler refactoring #67726
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pool 'boxed' helper objects used during constraints checking #67724
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [Draft - Help!] Generate comments as part of Extract Interface #67722
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cache the DiagnosticDescriptors produced by the C# diagnostic analyzer #67720
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move to a SegmentedHashSet from a SegmentedDictionary #67718
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move caching of classifications to non-focus priority #67716
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle additional diagnostic scenarios for captured primary constructor parameters #67712
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Update text in lsp misc files workspace #67721
    Area-IDE, LSP, untriaged, Next
  • Remove linq allocation overhead #67725
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Produce less ArrayBuilder waste when converting to dictionary #67723
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Switch all usages of Locations[0] to GetFirstLocation() #67678
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `roles` feature branch #67700
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove enumerator allocation in MakeAndCheckNonTypeMemberModifiers #67719
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Cache exceptions thrown by DiagnosticDescriptor to avoid excessive string allocations #67690
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Do not offer to simplify `if` statement to conditional expressions if both assignments are discards #67693
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add debugger display for operations #67706
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next

Updated

  • Round-trip extensions via metadata #67530
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Avoid realizing locations array when finding the symbol found in a particular location. #67691
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ignore file-local source declarations when searching for well-known types #67183
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Reduce allocations based on light bulb experimentation #67203
    Area-Compilers
  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers
  • Initial pass at enabling prebuilt detection #67645
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Support attributes on primary constructors #67695
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors, 17.7
  • Work to unify threading concepts between Workspace and ProjectSystemProjectFactory (part1) #67522
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [17.6] Only send workspace/configuration request when client supports that #67639
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow nested instance member access in `nameof` in static context #67461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Bot rules for stale issues and PRs #67684
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fixes imposibility of Edit and continue for methods with attributes with type #67704
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged
